## Astro Project - Sheety App Website

This is an Astro project with TypeScript support, converted from the original HTML website in the `www-sheetyapp` folder.

### Quick Start

- Development server: `npm run dev` (running at http://localhost:4321/)
- Build for production: `npm run build`
- Preview production build: `npm run preview`

### Project Structure

- `src/pages/` - Route pages (index.astro, about.astro, terms.astro)
- `src/components/` - Reusable components (Navigation.astro)
- `src/layouts/` - Page layouts (SheetyLayout.astro)
- `public/` - Static assets (logos, images, CNAME)
- `astro.config.mjs` - Astro configuration

### Converted Pages

- **Home (/)** - Main landing page with hero section and parallax effects
- **About (/about)** - Company information and team details  
- **Terms (/terms)** - Terms of service and privacy policy

### Features

- Responsive design with mobile navigation
- Parallax scrolling effects
- Floating call-to-action buttons
- Modern gradient designs
- Tailwind CSS integration
- SEO-friendly meta tags
